paper_abstract: Let gamma(P (m) a-P (n) ) be the domination number of the Cartesian product of directed paths P (m) and P (n) for m,na parts per thousand yen2. Liu et al. in (J. Comb. Optim. 22(4):651-662, 2011) determined the value of gamma(P (m) a-P (n) ) for arbitrary n and ma parts per thousand currency sign6. In this work we give the exact value of gamma(P (m) a-P (n) ) for any m,n and exhibit dominating sets of minimum cardinality.
paper_title: The domination number of Cartesian product of two directed paths
